Your chat partners will keep their message history with you, including the messages you shared in Secret Chats.

You can remove any messages for both sides at any time, but this will not be possible if you delete your account.

Are you really sure you want to reset all OctoGram settings? Any options applied will not be retained after restart.

Keep in mind that before resetting, you may want to make a backup so that you can recover these settings in the future.

SmartNotificationsPvtDialogButton: スマート通知を有効化
SmartNotificationsPvtDialogMessage:
This option is, by default, disabled on the official Telegram clients and therefore in private chats all notifications were sent with sound or vibration.

By enabling it, the behavior of notifications will vary in all chats: as well as in groups, all private chats will default to 2 notifications every 3 minutes.
SmartNotificationsPvtDialogMessagePlus: You can manage this option from OctoGram settings.
SmootherNavigation_Desc: Choose the fluidity of individual screens in the app

TranslatorHeaderLong: You can customize the integrated message translation experience in OctoGram settings.
TranslatorProviderSuggestedAccurate: It's very accurate but not recommended because of high limits.
TranslatorProviderSuggestedGeneral: It's the fastest provider but may resort to translation errors.
TranslatorProviderSuggestedPremium: Recommended if the account has a Telegram Premium subscription.

UpdatesSettingsPbetaDescription:
Your main account is part of OctoGram's private beta program.

By activating this option, you can receive updates from the private beta program directly via OTA like other stable and beta updates, but some updates settings (like "%s") will be forcibly activated.
